str2: From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Third. Ordinal from treis; third; neuter a third part, or a third time, thirdly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From ageiro; properly, the town-square; by implication, a market or thoroughfare.
Idle, lazy, thoughtless, unprofitable, injurious. (by implication) lazy, useless.
